accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

scopecontent.p: Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America ; Steel Workers Organizing Committee, CIO ; CIO ; International Union United Automobile Workers of America
Federation of Dyers, Finishers Printers & Bleachers of America ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America ; CIO
CIO ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America ; United Rubber Workers of America ; International Union United Automobile Workers of America
CIO ; United Farm Equipment & Metal Workers of America ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America
1947-1948, 1950, 1960, unknown. CIO ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America ; United Steelworkers of America ; Amalgamated Lithographers of America
"Our Shirt for Roosevelt" ; Krzycki for Congress ; United Textile Workers of America ; United Farm Equipment & Metal Workers of America

Michigan Labor Welcomes Mandela Freedom Tour 1990 ; American Slav Congress United for Victory ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America (badge) Biennial Convention, May 1966, Delegate (ribbons are torn and faded) ; Za-Odre-NYSE-Baltyk (pendant on a blue and white ribbon)

Delegate - 10th Convention - UAW-CIO Atlantic City March 23, 1946 (Andrew J. Ignash, LU600 - Dearborn) ; Delegate - Michigan CIO Council Seventh Annual Convention, July 12-16, 1944 (Andrew J. Ignasiak - #600 UAW Detroit) ; Visitor - 8th Annual convention Michigan State CIO Council Detroit - June 10-11, 1946 ; Visitor - June 11,12,13 & 14, 1956, Grand Rapids, Michigan ; Guest - First Convention, AFL-CIO - New York City Dec. 5, 1955

Alternate Delegate, 7th Annual Convention - UAW CIO - Chicago, Ill. - August 3rd, 1942 ; Delegate - 17th Constitutional Convention ; Polish American Club of So. Manchester, Conn. - Organized 1916 ; International Rep. - 16th Convention - UAW-CIO, Cleveland, Ohio - April 1-7, 1951 ; Visitor - Eleventh Annual Convention - Michigan State - CIO Council, Grand Rapids, Mich. - May 23,24,25, 1949

112th Annual Convention, State Council of Pennsylvania Jr. Order, United American Mechanics, Easton, PA. - Sept. 16-17, 1971 ; 117th State Convention Jr. O.U.A.M. - Seven Springs Pennsylvania - Sept. 22,23,24, 1976 (2) ; 116th Annual Convention Grand Lodge - E.F. Johnson Grand Chancellor - August 22nd-24th, 1983 - Downingtown, PA. ; Jr. O.U.A.M. - 128th Annual Session, York, PA 1987 ; Schilling Adv. ; Jr. Order - United American Mechanics - 124th Annual Session - Sheraton Jet-Port - Sept. 15 & 16, 1983 ; 122nd - State Convention - Jr. O.U.A.M. - Altoona, PA - Sept. 16-18, 1981
